welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Balangkas, the charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make memories that will last a lifetime!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and efficient terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, primarily serving Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small and outdated terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout all terminals, but may have limited coverage and slow speeds.
